favourite.article: We partake of all His riches just by calling, O Lord Jesus!

I'm 68 years old and a dear friend called me last night singing this over the phone. It was always a part of our lives as children/teenagers. So glad I know Who Everybody Ought to know! What a blessed reminder!
Everybody!!!!! He is dwelling in our spirit!!! Summer School of Truth. 2015
Not some people... Not most people... BUT EVERYBODY OUGHT TO KNOW!!

I sang it for the first time at a college meeting this week. I really enjoyed this hymn even though it's short and simple, it's just so full of the truth! Christ is the life-giving Spirit, that we can be one with Him in spirit and we can partake of Him by calling on His name! Praise the Lord for the speaking in this hymn!
Hallelujah! I know where Jesus dwells; He is dwelling in my spirit. Hallelujah! I know that He is the within life-giving Spirit! Hallelujah!
